content: geometry class is in session but don t worry this lesson is nothing but mind-bending fun in the mezzo cardigan crochet along you ll begin by crocheting two relaxing hexagons which will magically transform into the sleeves a back and sweater fronts this technique is so fun and interesting to watch come together while making the mezzo cardigan you ll have a chance to practice working in the round crocheting puff stitches and learning how to add a knit-esque ribbing to your sweater very in-depth step-by-step video tutorials will guide you each step of the way you can t beat the drape of this comfy lightweight sweater and you ll enjoy trying it on as you go it s easy to check the fit as you crochet so in the pattern you ll find lots of easy suggestions for customizing to fit your particular body this fun pattern includes optional stitch charts and plenty of diagrams photo and video tutorials no matter how you like to learn we ve got you covered with #themezzocardigan 1 pattern pattern is written in sizes s m l 1x 2x 3x 4x you ll need approximately 730 850 870 900 1140 1170 1320 g of category 3 dk or light worsted yarn to make your sweater this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level -
